name: Tetris (itch) (rubimalo)
description:
I am a student and I have made this game to practice during vacations, it has no music or animations. I helped myself with videos to know how to do some things.

Instructions:

UP ARROW: GO UP

DOWN ARROW: GO DOWN

RIGHT ARROW: GO RIGHT

LEFT ARROW: GO LEFT

ESCAPE: PAUSE THE GAME

ENJOY :)
